mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_id, member_id, title, content, views, regdate, editdate, status) VALUES (notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE, NULL, NVL(#{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'public'))
mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id AS noticeId, n.member_id AS memberId, n.title, n.content, n.views, n.regdate AS regDate, n.editdate AS editDate, n.status, m.nickname AS adminName -- 조인하여 관리자 이름 가져오기 FROM notice n LEFT JOIN member m ON n.member_id = m.member_id -- member 테이블과 조인
